# {{lb|fr|nonstandard|informal}} {{alt form|fr|plaindre|nocap=1}}

====Conjugation====
The only conjugations of ''plaigner'' that differ from those of ''plaindre'' are those in the simple future and conditional tenses.

|cond.p.3p=plaigneraient
